name: Killer Kitchen
description:
[MUST BE PLAYED IN FULLSCREEN!]

Only Optimized for 1920 X 1080 resolution.

School Exam project:

Your job is to follow your customers' demand and make the food they have requested.

"WASD" to move.

"E" to interact with objects.

Lettuce and tomatoes must be cut before they can be put in the bag, and meat must also be cooked at the cutting board and stove, respectively.

The lettuce and tomato are picked up at the boxes, and the meat is picked up in the space below.

be careful though, because you slowly get more and more insane down there, so you have to wash your hands to get less insane at the sink.

Finished ingredients should be dropped off at the brown bag up in the left corner of the game area where there is a window.

To remove ingredient from inventory use the trashcan in the lower left corner.

If the wrong ingredient is put in the bag, the entire order will be free/failed and you will therefore have to complete the order without any reward to get a new recipe.
